venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
www.wokai.org

Wokai, a global microfinance organization dedicated to alleviate poverty in China, is launching its Boston Chapter! Join the event on Wednesday, March 31st for a drink, to learn about microfinance and to meet new friends. Here is a preview of some event highlights:

* A presentation about Wokai and its impact on individuals living in poverty in rural China
* A panel discussion with Ed Chao, Danielle Donza and Scot Frank
* A cash bar reception to connect with like-minded individuals from the Greater Boston area

*Free to the public

6:30 - 7 pm Reception
7:00 - 7:30 pm Intro to Wokai
7:30 - 7:45 pm Speaker presentation


RSVP here:
http://spreadsheets.g...

Here is the Wokai Boston Facebook. Join if you are interested.

http://www.facebook.c...

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Wokai Launch Party
